title: Ticket #2315: Incorrect use of StringList unparsing methods, part deux
description:
The pigeon and hadoop code use StringList's print_to_string() and print_to_delimed_string() methods incorrectly. The methods return NULL when invoked on an empty list. Otherwise, the pointer they return must be free()d.

In both pigeon (src/condor_contrib/condor_pigeon) and hadoop (src/condor_hdfs), the return value of print_to_delimed_string() is passed directly to a writeXMLParam() method and either not free()d or checked for being NULL.

Milestones 20110810 Investigate impact
